summary: I SEND A COMPLAIN ABOUT MY AIR BAG RECALL FOR MY DODGE TRUCK 1500 AND I RECEIVED A LETTER EXPALINING TO ME THAT I HAVE TO CONTAC THE DODGE DEALER,I DID FEW TIMES AND THEY SAID WE DON'T HAVE ANY MORE AIR BAGAS YOU CAN CONTINUE DRIVING YOUR TRUCK LIKE THAT. AND I SAID WHAT ABOUT MY SAFETY OF MY FAMILY AND ME ??? I NEED TO REPLACED THIS AIR BAG BEFORE SOMETHING HAPPEN TO ME PLEASE CONTANC ME I TRY TO CALL BUT NOBODY ANSWER ME IM VERY WORRIED.THE DEALER LOOKS LIKE THEY ARE NOT WORRIED ABOUT THIS PROBLEM BUT IM . WHAT CAN I DO NEXT. ???
